description:
Advanced Installer is a Windows installer authoring tool for installing, updating, and configuring your products safely, securely, and reliably.

30 day trial of Architect edition with all features, then reverts to freeware version, unless activated.

**Please Note**: This is an automatically updated package. If you find it is
out of date by more than a day or two, please contact the maintainer(s) and
let them know the package is no longer updating correctly.
summary: Your solution for application packaging and deployment.
author: Caphyon
